detail_desc: Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long kimono in patterned satin with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and narrow ties inside. Contrasting colour trim with decorative stitching along the opening and at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft wool containing some recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Tight fit.
Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with flounces. V-neck, wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides.
Ribbed vest top in soft organic cotton jersey. Lace around the neckline and armholes and overlocked hem.
Tie in a herring-bone weave with shimmering stripes. Width 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Cut-out section with ties at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a lined drawstring hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with a unique nursing feature. Small stand-up collar and short sleeves with a decorative tab and button. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, wide elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Cable-knit dog jumper containing some wool with a foldover collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Long, fitted jumper in a textured knit with a slight sheen. Long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric. High collar with lacing at the top, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 20 pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and four pairs with pendants. Eight of the pairs are decorated with sparkly glass stones and two have plastic pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 7.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in a rib-knit nylon blend.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves.

Double-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with crossover straps that can be adjusted with press-studs at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with inset hole embroidery. Round neck, cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with pleats, a gently flared skirt and scalloped trim around the sleeves and hem. Jersey lining.
Block-coloured socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed, fold-down shaft.
Three-strand necklace with thin metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 32-40 cm.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front, wide flounce at the front and hem, and concealed zip in one side. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft knit.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sweatshirt in a printed cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long, oversized jumper in fine-knit wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slit at the cuffs and in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a text print and turn-up at the hem with silicone appliqués. The polyester content of the hat is recycled.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Fully lined swimsuit with a text print on the front, racer back and cut-out section at the back.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket and long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in stretch jersey containing glittery threads. Long sleeves, draping at the top and gathered seams at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Lined.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine-knit alpaca blend with a round, ribbed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to provide extra width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
Short dress in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and butterfly sleeves with flatlock hems.
Spacious handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top. Three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Three necklaces in different widths of metal chain. Adjustable length, 41-48 cm.
Spotted bow tie in a jacquard weave with an adjustable fastening at the back. Width 6 cm.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a drawstring V-neck, short sleeves with a seam and flounced trim, and an asymmetric seam at the hem with a flounce.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with a print motif and elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
